modules.description: Provides functions to match strings against Unix shell-style patterns using globbing rules, including support for flags like case insensitivity and recursive matching. Operates on strings and path patterns, returning matched results or errors. Used to filter files in a directory based on pattern matching, such as selecting all `.log` files or excluding hidden files.

Provides functions to match file paths against patterns with customizable behavior, including directory marking, error handling, and brace expansion. Operates on strings and arrays of strings, supporting recursive directory traversal and pattern expansion. Used for filtering files, handling shell-like pattern matching, and processing user-provided glob syntax in file operations.
